title: This is Vela
content:
This is VelaHi, I’m Vela from Shandong University, majoring in Internet of Things Engineering(IoT Engineering).Currently I’m interested in Artificial Intelligence, expecially the Deep Learning.If you want to contact me, just Email yf@vela.pro.  
GitHub RepositoriesFor all, you can access https://github.com/VelaQ?tab=repositories  
I’ve written several Deep-Learning projects, including the following topics:
1. image-restoration

  

2. isolated-word recognition.
